page.title: 10THE HOTEL
page.content: {BUCKLAND HOUSE}belonged to what was originally the Manor of the 12th C. {TUSSEINTZ}family. It is now the distinguished { BUCKLAND TOUT SAINTS HOTEL The present house,Queen Anne period,is now owned and run by the{SHEPHERD family.There is usually a staff of 9. The hotel is away from main centres like Kingsbridge and offers a rural and refined stay or meal for people who want a... {"quiet,elegant country house {atmosphere". It also provides special stays that offer a range of planned activities such as golf,fishing and Theatre. There are 15 guest bedrooms and a and a dining room that can seat 40. The Hotel is busier in the summer but is open most of the year and is known locally for its excellent menus.
